attributes.action: Prevent State-Aided Bankers from Receiving Bonuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK taxpayers/Government now own majority stakes in RBS Group, yet the bank want to hand out a billion pounds in bonuses.
We should not be paying bonuses out of our own pockets, let alone for failure, to people who now supposedly work for us.
This petition calls for a ban on bonuses for the banking executives, which is being taken from the £20 billion in taxpayers money which is shoring up the banks in the first place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
